author: Xbox
description:
On the surface, a bolder path awaits. 

As a Raider scavenging the remnants of a derelict world, you settle into a vast fractured underground settlement, Hoping to thrive, you jump on the chance to start over, to build a new home for yourself. But doing so means you must return to the surface where ARC machines roam unchecked, and survivors' motives remain dangerously unclear.

But if you are brave enough to wander and seek.

Who knows what you might find.

ARC Raiders launches October 30th.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/arc-raiders/9NDF1F263RZ4

author: Xbox
description:
Cowabunga dude! Tie on your ninja masks, grab a slice of pizza, and unleash your favorite half-shelled heroes or diabolical villains with the 'ARK x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' Cosmetic Pack!

This premium mod lets you jump into the action with the iconic looks of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael, and Michelangelo – complete with signature weapons and radical voiceovers. And of course, the turtles aren't complete without their Master Splinter and their friends April O' Neil & Casey Jones. If you prefer to cause chaos, suit up as Shredder or one of his Foot clan, and unleash a horde of Mousers!

author: Xbox
description:
Fight with Pride, Master Temperance; 33 Immortals, the co-op action roguelike, unleashes its biggest update yet.

What’s new in this update:
- Two New Weapons
- New Ordeals
- New Chamber Objectives
…and even more surprises!

Join the rebellion, and face the Wrath of God.

Play 33 Immortals now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/33-immortals-game-preview/9p8lr42ptrgj

33 Immortals is a co-op action-roguelike for 33 players. Play a damned soul, and rebel against God's final judgment. Dive straight into epic 33-player co-op battles with instant “pick-up and raid” matchmaking. Cooperate with your allies to survive against hordes of monsters and massive, challenging bosses. Expand your arsenal and equip powerful new relics to permanently upgrade your soul. Face the wrath of God in a fight for your eternal life.

author: Xbox
description:
An otherworldly, story-driven shooter with aggressive gunfights and terrifying monsters awaits you. This is the story of a girl who, by the will of fate, faced the beast - and in order to become free, she was forced to study its nature. How far can you go in the fight for your freedom? Out now on Xbox!
